ResearchProjectDef.label: Pushing The Limits
ResearchProjectDef.description: From the dawn of our civilization we have been in the shadow of the ancient's Cosmic Matter, a material whose perfection transcends our very perception of reality. We've found the lock, all we've got to do now is make the key.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Steel
ResearchProjectDef.description: It is time that we harnessed the power of Cosmic Matter on this planet. Through the investigation of Cosmic Matter's influence and reaction to various materials, we could hopefully create an alloy strong enough to house the endless power of Cosmic Matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Starsteel Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our current methods of developing Starsteel are rather inefficient, as it is highly difficult to prepare for the next step of Starsteel production while currently working on one stage. If we can devise a way to prep for a later stage of Starsteel production, we could theoretically improve the speed of the Cosmic Forge drastically.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: The bionic limbs of today suffer from the truth that they have limits. There are just things bionics cannot achieve alone, even the grand Archotech set of bionics often cannot rise to the occasion.\n\nSo, we will turn to Starsteel to make limbs both precise and tough, able to last a soldier and sate a mechanic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Weaponisation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Starsteel can withstand extreme temperatures, and Cosmic Matter can create those extreme temperatures that Starsteel is made to withstand. To weaponize this...\n\nIt would surely be a most fruitful endeavor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Armors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Starsteel can withstand intense pressures and take an extreme amount of damage. It would logically make the perfect armor, able to withstand all forces with ease.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Energy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cosmic Matter contains vast amounts of energy, energies too difficult to extract under normal circumstances to make it a reality. If we can figure out how to safely extract this energy, we could potentially generate a truly endless amounts of energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hydroponics Basins can be made significantly more efficient with the introduction of a more intensive nutrient bath with the light sprinking of Starsteel, nearly tripling the effectiveness of Hydroponics-based technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Medicinals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Starsteel boasts incredible antimicrobial properties, to a point that we could better our existing medicines just by replacing a few tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Perfected Food Preparation
ResearchProjectDef.description: To reach for the stars we needed both full rockets and full stomachs. Let us ensure we can do both for the long journey ahead of us!\n\nFood is cooked just like any other meals, on the electric/fueled stove.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Drug Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Recreational and functional drugs of today are rather flawed, most having various side-effects and/or long-term damage that cause great risk--especially for those who lack self-control. While we cannot re-create them perfectly, we can at least try to make something better.\n\nAnything unlocked by this technology are either made in a Stove or the Drug Lab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Next-Generation Recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: While our existing methods of recreation are perfectly fine, there are still many things that we could improve to better our lives, primarily in the consideration of AI-applications.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: We must reach higher, and grasp beyond even the Stars themselves. We must sieze the very fabric of the universe to reach our final destination. We must achieve purity, we must achieve perfection, we must achieve eternity. We must draw from the very source, find the key to our desires of a cosmic age.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The Second Generation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Meeting the absolute zenith of human technology, we achieve the Second Generation of the Ancient's arcane technologies.\n\nThis technology unlocks the Cosmic Manipulator, which allows you to either make Cosmic Matter or the legendary Cosmic Alloy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Cosmic Matter Stabilization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our current methods of Cosmic Matter manipulation is crude, drawing chaotic Cosmic Matter almost too unstable to exist in our reality, requiring extreme patience and care when attempting to work with it or draw any remotely stable amount of it. While we can't magically stumble upon a less chaotic varient of Cosmic Matter, we can artificially make it more stable and thus easier to work with.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Just meeting the level of Archotech limbs is not enough. Just like everything else we've made, we must soar beyond the technologies of old and embrace the new, so that we can perisist. Nothing will break our will, or our limbs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Weapons Generation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: What we have is not enough. We must grow stronger, more powerful.\n\nAnd perhaps, we can even make something of pure terror, in the process.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Armor made of Starsteel is simply put, not enough. We must push further, imbue Power Armor with the might of Cosmic Matter and Cosmic Alloy. This armor shall withstand all the forces of Eternity!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Energy Generation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Generation II Cosmic Matter reactor does not rely on a catalyst to produce endless amounts of energy, but instead allows direct inserting of Cosmic Matter into the reactor, for a much cleaner and longer burn and even higher generation rate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Hydroponics Generation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Generation II Cosmic Hydroponics Basin does not rely on a custom-made nutrient bath for plants to grow in with trace amounts of Cosmic Alloy for prosperity, but instead, it infuses the very cells of plants with Cosmic Matter, allowing for plants to grow at their very limit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Medicinals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Pushing the envelope further, we can achive perfection beyond Glitterworld medicine with the help of Cosmic Alloy and Cosmic Matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Foods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perfecting the art of cosmic-based foods, we can rest easy and content knowing our future is fed with the help of Cosmic Alloy and Cosmic Matter.\n\nFood is cooked just like any other meals, on the electric/fueled stove.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Drugs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Leaping to greater highs, we can make better, safer, and more effective drugs for both recreation and operation with our growing mastery of Cosmic Matter.\n\nDrugs unlocked by this technology must made in the Cosmic Manipulator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Soaring towards our joys, we can improve the quality of our lives through perpetual pursuit of better recreational buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Reaching The Limits
ResearchProjectDef.description: There is one last known feat of Cosmic Matter; Creating matter out of pure Cosmic Matter. The cost may be great, but the reward will be infinitely more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Type-Theta Cosmic Matter
ResearchProjectDef.description: Type-Theta Cosmic Matter is a highly stable form of Cosmic Matter, and is the galaxy's favorite version as it is it common enough to be exploitable without being too much more expensive to produce than the lesser Cosmic Matter-forms of old. While the machinery required will be highly expensive and complex, the benefits are sure to outweigh the costs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Eternal Turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through the mastery of Cosmic Matter, we can manufacture perfect turrets that never need reload or refurbishment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: The Great Unknown
ResearchProjectDef.description:
There is so much that happens in this world that we will never be able to see or understand. There are forces beyond us, forces we could never hope to understand.

This world seems to beckon us, push us towards the final goal. Fragments of something long lost, of a people long gone, scattered about unused by any others.

Let us find these fragments, and ascend beyond greatness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Peering Beyond The Veil
ResearchProjectDef.description: There is still something out there, something eternal and invisible we have yet to grasp onto.\n\nLet us near it as close as we may, and then leap forward.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Breaching The Limits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Just when we thought we had reached the limits and hit the technological ceiling, we had found yet another key to greatness. Dubbed 'Eternium', this is the ultimate material. Its properties are much alike that of Cosmic Matter, but with stability not seen anywhere else. We should be able to draw it from the Call of the Cosmos.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced R.I.F.T. Creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The R.I.F.T. Fabricator is unique in that it is able to process more than one access point of space at a time, allowing more Cosmic Matter and Eternium to be processed before experiencing diminishing returns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Type-Beta Cosmic Matter
ResearchProjectDef.description: The second form of Cosmic Matter that was discovered is Type-Beta, a form of Cosmic Matter so volatile and unstable that it was only useful for emergency kickstart-power to allow a more stable form of Cosmic Matter to take over. This instability could greatly benefit us, as Type-Beta Cosmic Matter can disrupt the very fabric of reality enough to make the collection of higher-stability forms of Cosmic Matter and Eternium far easier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project ETERNALS
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nigh-on unbreakable, third-generation bionics are re-inforced with thin layers of Eternium to make the most precise and powerful bionic replacements possible in the universe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project OVERTAKER
ResearchProjectDef.description: Behold, our finest creations; the weapons that shall shatter the very foundation of Creation! UNLEASH THE E.X.A.R.C.H.!\n\nUnlocks the ultimate weaponry, alongside a superweapon to overcome all others.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project CHARON
ResearchProjectDef.description: An immovable object, The CHARON Armor provides the ultimate form of protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project EMBERS
ResearchProjectDef.description: Defeating expectation, the Generation Omega Cosmic Reactor draws Cosmic Matter directly from the eternal plane, fueling itself without any need for input. Forever.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project EDEN
ResearchProjectDef.description: Surpassing the odds, we shatter the need for space to grow as we find every last prosperous boon we can find, with the Eternium Hydroponics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project EVERLAST
ResearchProjectDef.description: Overcoming fate, we embrace Eternium whole-heartedly with medical tools so grand that not even Archotechs could replicate them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project HEDONIST: Food
ResearchProjectDef.description: Superceding hunger, we utilize Eternium to fuel our bodies and our spirits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project HEDONIST: Drugs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Bypassing suffering, we utilize Eternium to further increase the great joy that is existence.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project HEDONIST: Recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Overcoming boredom, we utilize Eternim to make the best recreational buildings of all creation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Unto The Zenith
ResearchProjectDef.description: Let's race past this horizon, and rest upon a whole new one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pinnacle Of Creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: We are the pinnacle of creation. The Zenith of all, the tower atop the eternal, endless sea. We reached up to the stars and the skies, and grasped onto the vast horizons. We finally, at last know the truth: We are the undisputed masters of all reality, atop the Zenith, beyond all perception. Such great privilage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Beyond our Understanding
ResearchProjectDef.description: In the darkness of what lies beyond our vision lies the true great Unknown, the second ceiling of all technology; that one hard barrier that inhibits all progress. Some things will forever lie beyond our grasp, for Science Never Stops, even with our Ambition of the Cosmic.\n\n[[NOTE: This research is NOT intended to be completed. Usually, it is made so that it literally cannot be completed.]
